name: Patchwork Harmony
description:
Patchwork Harmony
As a birthday present, an old toymaker stitches a new toy bunny for his granddaughter. Brought to life after an unknown amount of time, embark on a journey with Patches to navigate and solve puzzles to repair and deliver a magical music box to her. In these challenging levels, use the power of the music box to create platforms to bring you closer to your goal!

Controls
Arrow Keys - Left and right movement, jump
Shift Key - Pick up and drop items
Spacebar - Create platforms

Developed by Grapple Studio
Anfernee Lai - Lead Designer and Writer
Andrew Xu - Lead Programmer
Veenna San Felipe - Lead Artist
Michael Sim - Lead Sound Designer

Game developed as part of the Game Design Experience and Game Development Experience courses  at the University of California Santa Cruz instructed by Elizabeth Swensen and Nathan Altice.

Originally published on June 6, 2019
